name: The Evil Resides
description:
Trapped in a nightmare town with monsters crawling in the shadows, can you survive 3 days of scavenging and shooting?

Made for StencylJam2015 in about 72 hours.

=========Controls========

WASD- Move
Mouse - Aim and Shoot
R - Reload
1/2/3 - Switch Weapons (if you've got one)
